plot: Shadowglade follows the ordeals of three police detectives, all supernatural beings themselves, as they investigate paranormal and non-paranormal crimes while dealing with their own hidden existences.
plot_en: Shadowglade follows the ordeals of three police detectives, all supernatural beings themselves, as they investigate paranormal and non-paranormal crimes while dealing with their own hidden existences.
plot_es: Shadowglade follows the ordeals of three police detectives, all supernatural beings themselves, as they investigate paranormal and non-paranormal crimes while dealing with their own hidden existences.
title: Shadowglade
